name: logos-notes-exporter-monorepo
description: Logos Notes Exporter - CLI and Electron applications with shared core

scripts.build: pnpm build:config && pnpm build:core && pnpm build:cli && pnpm build:electron
scripts.test:all: echo 'Running comprehensive test suite...' && pnpm --filter @logos-notes-exporter/cli test || echo 'Note: Full test suite implementation pending'
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/dist packages/*/node_modules packages/*/.webpack packages/*/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.reinstall: pnpm clean:all && pnpm install && pnpm build
scripts.validate:deps: test -d packages/config/dist || (echo 'Config package not built. Run: pnpm build:config' && exit 1)
scripts.validate:core: test -d packages/core/dist || (echo 'Core package not built. Run: pnpm build:core' && exit 1)
scripts.validate: echo 'Running pre-commit validation...' && pnpm lint && pnpm build && pnpm test:all && echo 'All validations passed! âœ…'

author: Logos Notes Exporter
